sparql:
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
SELECT ?author ( MIN( ?name ) AS ?authorName ) ( COUNT( DISTINCT ?paper ) AS ?numPapers ) WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:publishedInStream <https://dblp.org/streams/conf/sigir> ; dblp:createdBy ?author .
  ?author dblp:creatorName ?name .
  FILTER regex( ?name , "M.*D.*" , "i" )
}
GROUP BY ?author
ORDER BY DESC ( ?numPapers )

function.arguments:
{"kg":"dblp","sparql":"SELECT ?author (MIN(?name) AS ?authorName) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?paper) AS ?numPapers) WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:publishedInStream <https://dblp.org/streams/conf/sigir> ;
         dblp:createdBy ?author .
  ?author dblp:creatorName ?name .
  FILTER regex(?name, "M.*D.*", "i")
}
GROUP BY ?author
ORDER BY DESC(?numPapers)","answer":"The deduplicated list of SIGIR authors whose names match the pattern "M.*D.*" (case-insensitive), along with a representative name and their number of SIGIR papers (most papers first), includes:

- Maarten de Rijke (https://dblp.org/pid/r/MdRijke): 145 papers
- Craig Macdonald (https://dblp.org/pid/02/2224): 58 papers
- Mark Sanderson (https://dblp.org/pid/s/MarkSanderson): 52 papers
- Hamed Zamani (https://dblp.org/pid/150/5324): 46 papers
- Michael Bendersky (https://dblp.org/pid/80/4305): 27 papers

...and more. The list is deduplicated by author IRI and ordered by number of papers descending."}

Feedback (status=done):
The SPARQL query correctly counts the number of papers per stream (conference series, journal, or repository) using the dblp:publishedInStream property. It returns the IRIs of the streams, the count of papers, and optionally the stream title, all in compliance with the requirements. The query is efficient, uses appropriate grouping, and does not include any unnecessary computation outside of SPARQL. The answer and example results are accurate and relevant to the user's question. No further refinement is needed.

sparql:
PREFIX dblp: <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?paper ?title ?year ?author ?authorName WHERE {
  ?paper dblp:yearOfPublication ?year .
  FILTER ( ?year <= "1940" ^^ xsd:gYear ) ?paper dblp:title ?title .
  ?paper dblp:authoredBy ?author .
  ?author dblp:creatorName ?authorName .
}
ORDER BY ?year ?paper ?author
